text: Petr Fiala (born 1 September 1964) is a Czech politician, political scientist and university professor. In 2021, he became the 13th Prime Minister of the Czech Republic. He has been leader of the Civic Democratic Party (ODS) since 2014. He was a member of the Chamber of Deputies since 2013. From 2012 to 2013 Fiala was Minister of Education, Youth and Sports. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Czech academics Category:Political scientists Category:People from Brno Category:Prime ministers of the Czech Republic Category:Current national leaders
title: Petr Fiala
